headline: How Market Shifts and Cocoa Prices Are Shaping Hershey Stock in 2025
summary: If you’re wondering what to make of Hershey right now, you’re not alone. Even the most experienced investors can find themselves second-guessing when a classic brand like Hershey goes through a stretch of mixed performance. The stock recently closed at $189.20, and if you’ve been following along, you’ll know it hasn’t exactly been a smooth ride lately. In the past week, the stock dipped by 3.1% after a modest 2.3% gain over the last month, underlining how quickly sentiment can shift. Yet,...
